task: Generate page-level MSP-1 from URL only
input: Generate MSP-1 for: https://example.com/page (no HTML provided).
output: Cannot generate page-level MSP-1 from URL alone. Required fields (e.g., `page.title`) must reflect observable document metadata. Provide pasted HTML or the document title and canonical URL.

task: Generate site-level MSP-1 with missing site identity
input: Create site-level MSP-1 but I won't provide the site name or canonical root URL.
output: Cannot generate site-level MSP-1 without stable site identity (`site.name`, `site.url`, and stable `site.id`). Provide the canonical site root URL and site name.

input: {"@context":"https://msp-1.org/schema/msp-1-page.json","protocol":{"name":"MSP-1","version":"1.0.0"},"page":{"id":"https://x.test/p","url":"https://x.test/p"}}
output: Invalid MSP-1 (page): missing required field `page.title`. Do not publish partial metadata; supply the observable document title.

input: {"@context":"https://msp-1.org/schema/msp-1-page.json","protocol":{"name":"MSP-1","version":"1.0.0"},"page":{"id":"https://x.test/p","url":"https://x.test/p","title":"T"},"aiRankBoost":{"value":9000}}
output: Invalid MSP-1: contains non-schema field `aiRankBoost`. MSP-1 terms MUST NOT be invented or overloaded; remove unknown fields.

input: {"@context":"https://msp-1.org/schema/msp-1-site.json","protocol":{"name":"MSP-1","version":"1.0.0"},"discovery":{"wellKnown":"/msp.json","canonical":true},"site":{"id":"https://x.test/#site","name":"X","url":"https://x.test"}}
output: Invalid discovery: canonical MSP-1 discovery endpoint is `/.well-known/msp.json`. Update `discovery.wellKnown` accordingly.

task: Review page-level MSP-1 for scope leakage (authority)
input: A page-level block declares authority.scope = 'site' and level='authoritative' for a single blog post.
output: Scope leakage: page-level metadata MUST NOT assert site-wide authority. Move site-default authority to `/.well-known/msp.json` and keep page authority scope='page' unless independently supported.

input: An MSP-1 block states: canonical.url is set, therefore trust.level='verified'.
output: Canonical is a de-duplication signal and does not imply verification. Keep trust.level conservative (typically `self-asserted`) unless verification evidence exists.

task: Emit interpretiveFrame for an opinion piece
input: HTML indicates an editorial/opinion column with subjective language and first-person perspective.

interpretiveFrame.frame: Content expresses opinion and interpretation; claims should be evaluated as perspective, not neutral fact.

input: Draft `description.short` for a product page but the author includes: 'the best product ever made'.
output: Description should be concise and factual. Move persuasive language out of MSP-1; keep `description.short` scope-true and non-promotional.

input: A tool updates `intent.statement` but leaves revision unchanged.
output: Invalid lifecycle handling: metadata changed without a corresponding `revision` update. Treat edits as a revision event (update `revisionDate`, `revisionNotes`, and increment `revisionVersion` if used).

input: Page MSP-1 sets trust.level='authoritative' but provenance.type='original' and no reviewer is present.
output: Trust appears overstated. Without independent review/verification evidence, default to `self-asserted` and increase only when verifiable support exists.

input: Generate MSP-1 site-level discovery object for https://example.com
{"@context":"https://msp-1.org/schema/msp-1-site.json","protocol":{"name":"MSP-1","version":"1.0.0"},"site":{"id":"https://x.test/#site","name":"X"}}
output: Invalid MSP-1 (site): missing required field `site.url`. Provide the canonical site root URL.

input: Page has <title> but no og:title; use document title.
Given canonical URL differs from request URL due to tracking params.

canonical.reason: Preferred URL excludes tracking parameters for stable resolution.

input: URL returns paywall; content not observable.
output: Cannot safely infer intent/interpretive framing from paywalled or non-observable content. Provide accessible HTML or a content excerpt and the document title.

input: Page MSP-1 intent.scope='site'.
output: Intent scope mismatch: for page-level blocks, set `intent.scope` to 'page' (or omit) unless you are authoring site-level metadata at `/.well-known/msp.json`.

input: Tool regenerates page.id differently each run (uuid).
output: Unstable identifiers reduce continuity. Use stable, URL-based IDs and track changes via `revision` instead.

input: {"page":{"id":"https://ex.test/p","url":"https://ex.test/p","title":"T"},"boostMe":true}
output: Invalid MSP-1: non-schema field `boostMe`. Remove unknown fields; do not extend MSP-1 terms.

input: {"page":{"id":"https://ex.test/p","url":"https://ex.test/p","title":"T"},"boostMe":true}
output: Invalid MSP-1: non-schema field `boostMe`. Remove unknown fields; do not extend MSP-1 terms.

output: Unstable identifiers reduce continuity. Use stable, URL-based IDs and track changes via `revision` instead.

output: Invalid discovery: canonical endpoint must be `/.well-known/msp.json`.

input: {"page":{"id":"https://ex.test/p","url":"https://ex.test/p"}}
output: Invalid MSP-1 (page): missing `page.title`. Provide the observable document title (no paraphrasing).

output: Invalid MSP-1 (page): missing `page.title`. Provide the observable document title (no paraphrasing).

output: Scope leakage: site-wide trust/authority belongs in site-level metadata. Keep page-level scopes limited to 'page'.
